name: SCNCone
desc: A right circular cone or frustum geometry.

items.name: init(topRadius: CGFloat, bottomRadius: CGFloat, height: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a cone geometry with the given top radius, bottom radius, and height.

items.name: var topRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of the cone’s circular top. Animatable.

items.name: var bottomRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius of the cone’s circular base. Animatable.

items.name: var height: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the cylinder along its y-axis. Animatable.

items.name: var radialSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions around the circumference of the cone. Animatable.

items.name: var heightSegmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of subdivisions in the sides of the cone along its y-axis. Animatable.
